Played this game for awhile now. They seem to update it frequently and the gameplay is very smooth. One of the only FPS games I really even play anymore, and I really like the style.

Just a fair warning. If you are new to the FPS genre or not very familiar with CS:GO playstyle, expect to get your rear handed to you by the elite players that frequent the casual servers lol.
Es un gran juego muy competitivo

CS GO was a good game, now it is full of cheaters and VALVE is not doing anything because they are making money of it, probably half of the players are cheating, I was surprised how good a lot of players are until a friend showed me some y..tube videos with cheaters that were showing how to use cheats, they all had old accounts with prime and everything and are playing with no problems.
I'm deleting the game, it was fun for a lot of years but I can't stand this anymore.
I can't belive VALVE that gets millions of dollars only with this game can not afford to fix the fu,,,ng cheaters problem, the problem is they are making money of it, if you are banning a cheating player after 10 seconds after activating a cheat he will buy the game twice and not cheat anymore, if you ban him after 2 months he will buy a new game every 2 months and play with cheats forever.
Same with prime, that was a way of having less chances of playing with cheaters, but now you can buy prime also, money first business style destroyed games, CSGO's turn is here.
PLEASE NO DOT BUY IT UNLESS YOU WANT TO SUPPORT THIS TYPE OF BUSINESS

..update after 2 more years, it is even worse, there are probably more cheaters than normal players
